basics.name: Michaella Villanueva
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information & Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: digitized the Center for South Asian Studies archive at the University of Hawai’i at Mānoa
performed standard administrative tasks, including file organization and general paperwork

work.company: Nurse Aide at R&P Villanueva Care Home
highlights: managed the daily routines of patients, ensuring their well-being and comfort
